name: VIR
description:
This is a game about an antivirus doing what an antivirus does. But, instead of cleaning your computer for you, it shoots lasers and stuff. That's probably more effective anyways.

Fight mobs of enemies to gain score and progress the game, defeat larger enemies in boss battles to collect upgrades that improve your stats in unique ways. Unlock new weapons and active abilities as you play and get better each time you lose and retry. 

this isn't a normal computer virus you're dealing with.

(I will still be updating this game. Check my twitter for occasional updates. https://mobile.twitter.com/Two_Thirtytwo )
